text: Marxist-Hitlerism or Nguemaism is a ideology form of National Bolshevism,Socialism invented by Francisco Macías Nguema (comparing himself to Karl Marx and Adolf Hitler) in 1968 in Equatorial Guinea but Nguema also would have also compared himself to Vladimir Lenin,Joseph Stalin and Mao Zedong not only Karl Marx and Adolf Hitler . It is also more extreme than Pol Pot’s National Communism in Cambodia . Nguemaism is nowadays banned in Equatorial Guinea by Francisco Macías Nguema’s nephew Teodoro Obiang Nguema Mbasogo since 1979 and 1982 .
title: Marxist-Hitlerism
